.class public auto ansi sealed ServiceDescription extends System.Web.Services.Description.NamedItem

summary.span: 提供一种方法，以创建和格式化用于描述 XML Web services 的有效的 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档文件，该文件是完整的，具有适当的命名空间、元素和特性。

span.span: Provides a means of creating and formatting a valid Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document file, complete with appropriate namespaces, elements, and attributes, for describing an XML Web service.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类的实例可以使用 `new` 关键字或静态 方法创建，此方法会分析 WSDL 文件，并将其值分配给类的适当成员。Instances of this class can be created with either the `new` keyword or the static method, which parses a WSDL file and assigns its values to appropriate members of the class. WSDL 是一种基于 XML 的语言，用于描述 XML Web services。WSDL is an XML-based language for describing XML Web services. 类对应于 WSDL 文件的根元素 `definitions` 。The class corresponds to the root element, `definitions`, of a WSDL file. 有关 WSDL 的更多信息，请参阅 [WSDL](https://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/) 规范。For more information about WSDL, see the [WSDL](https://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/) specification. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建 类的实例。The following example shows how to create an instance of the class. [!code-cpp[ServiceDescription#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescription/CPP/servicedescription.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ServiceDescription#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescription/CS/servicedescription.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ServiceDescription#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ServiceDescription/VB/servicedescription.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取用于在 对象和 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档之间进行序列化和反序列化的 XML 序列化程序。

span.span: Gets the XML serializer used to serialize and deserialize between a object and a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

value.span: 用于在 对象和 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文档之间进行序列化和反序列化的 XML 序列化程序。

span.span: The XML serializer used to serialize and deserialize between a object and a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用派生自抽象类的类自定义 XML 序列化程序 。The XML serializer can be customized using classes derived from the abstract class. 这些类是使用 `serviceDescriptionFormatExtensionTypes` 元素及其子元素在配置文件中指定的 `add` 。These classes are specified in a configuration file using the `serviceDescriptionFormatExtensionTypes` element and its child `add` element. 此配置可应用于发布 Web 服务的 ASP.NET Web 应用程序。The configuration can be applied to an ASP.NET Web application that publishes a Web service.
